author: ggolden
msg: This is a revert, really:
JetspeedAccessController to 1.2
DefaultJetspeedRunData to 1.9
Removed the change that removed the profile from the User getTemp()
Somethings in the customizers and navigations want it there!

author: kimptoc
msg: enable the db browser to use alternate torque pool connection

author: ggolden
msg: Changed getAttributeNames to return a String[] rather than an iterator.
Made the JetspeedStateManagerService implementation use synchronized
maps to be more thread safe.

author: taylor
msg: Changed JetspeedLinkFactory.getInstance() from public to package access since it crashes at run time when used in combination with DynamicURI, which requires rundata upon construction.
There are unit tests which seem to work fine, so Im leaving package access in place.
Example of failed usage:
1. create a link with JetspeedLinkFactory.getInstance()
2. make use of any of the DynamicURI-based methods in JetspeedLink
3. you will receive a null pointer error
